title: Ultimate Marvel vs. Capcom 3
notes: Playable and mostly smooth. Occasional small lag spikes, probably cause by last minute asset loading or shader compilations; the longer you play, the less this occurs! Audio issues (missing SFX, audio options don't seem to work, some BGM sounds slightly wrong?).

title: Ultimate Marvel vs. Capcom 3
notes: Randomly stuck with music loop a few times.  Once after char select, the other after a game over.  But played an entire game fine.
specs: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-8700K CPU @ 3.70GHz / MSI GTX 1070 8GB

notes: Erratic frame rate can be fixed by adding "PROTON_NO_ESYNC=1 %command%" to launch options. Game will stutter as it compiles shaders, but will improve as they are cached. Sound effects and voices do not play; in-game sound options non-functional.
title: ULTIMATE MARVEL VS. CAPCOM 3

gpu: Intel Open Source Technology Center Mesa DRI Intel(R) Ivybridge Mobile
notes:
HP elitebook 9470m
Fedora 28

Audio issue: only music no sound
title: ULTIMATE MARVEL VS. CAPCOM 3

notes: Music is very loud, no sound effects and few voices. Sound is perfect when launched from Lutris, so it's probably just something that needs to be tweaked with whatever version of Wine Steam is using.
title: ULTIMATE MARVEL VS. CAPCOM 3

notes: Broken audio can be fixed by installing xact to the game prefix (...steamapps/compatdata/357190/pfx/) via winetricks. I also have xaudio2_7 set to "native,builtin" through winecfg, but this might not be necessary. Opening cut scene needs winetricks wmp9, but it cannot be installed on a 64-bit prefix.
title: ULTIMATE MARVEL VS. CAPCOM 3
